programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: Un Sac De Billes, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dois irmos judeus fogem por toda a Frana durante a ocupao alem na Segunda Guerra Mundial, tentando encontrar sua famlia novamente.

programme.title: E Se... Voc Tivesse Uma Segunda Chance?, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: H 15 anos, Ben Walker deixou sua namorada, sua cidade e seu ministrio por uma oportunidade de negcios. Agora ele tem uma slida carreira e uma noiva. Um dia ele visitado por um anjo que mostra como seria sua vida se ele tivesse seguido seu chamado.

programme.title: Correndo por Um Sonho, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de Michelle Payne, a primeira jquei feminina a vencer a Melbourne Cup.

programme.title: Salomo, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Aps a morte do rei Davi, seu filho Salomo torna-se o novo Rei de Israel. Famoso por sua sabedoria, justia e amor adorado por seu povo e pelos visitantes que vm de todas as partes do mundo.

programme.title: Davi, (1997, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: De um simples pastor a um poderoso rei, Davi, com muita coragem e f, comanda o reino de Israel por muitos anos e deixa seu nome na Histria.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: Camp (Lio de Vida), (2021, Drama)

programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.desc: The battle between the King and the Chairman is finally about to begin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Ikalgo remembers his mission to find Palm.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua confronts Palm.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Shaiapouf and Menthuthuyoupi make their way to the King. While Neferpitou uses Doctor Blythe to treat Komugi.
programme.sub-title: Great Power x And x Ultimate Power

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King dodges Netero's onslaught as he plans his own attack.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Death Note: Silence

programme.desc: Polnareff realizes that Enyaba is a new assassin sent by DIO. He is prevented from warning his comrades by Enyaba's Stand "Justice," which has the ability to control corpses.

programme.desc: After surviving Enyaba's attack, Jotaro and crew make it to Pakistan's capital, Karachi. There, they encounter DIO's next assassin, Dan of Steel.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Lovers Part 2
programme.desc: Dan of Steel's Stand, "The Lovers," has entered Joseph's brain. With Joseph's life on the line, Jotaro has no choice but to carry out Dan's orders, but the rest of his companions have their own say in the matter.

programme.desc: Jotaro and his fellows take camels and travel across the desert, headed for Cairo. Along the way, though, they can't shake the sensation that someone or something is watching their every move.

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)

programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Seor Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Usopp uses Viola's Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster, and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp's ammunition has been specially designed for this situation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!

programme.title: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy's own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Seor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law's Ultimate Stratagem!

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Be Free! Law's Injection Shot Blasts!

programme.title: Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Bellamy escapes Doflamingo's control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!

programme.title: Lao G and Don Chinjao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!

programme.title: Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man's Pride! Bellamy's Last Charge!

programme.title: A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger's horrible true nature!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!

programme.title: Bartolomeo is in a neck-and-neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Princess Mansherry's amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who've gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Seor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Seor's tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Manly Duel! Seor's Elegy of Love!

programme.title: Franky and Seor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner's sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stardust of Death! Diamante's Storm of Vicious Attacks!

programme.title: Kyros, unbowed by Diamante's vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: The Old Barn Dance, (1938, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are horse traders who run into trouble when an unscrupulous tractor company starts selling the modern machines to farmers.

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: Home on the Prairie, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Livestock inspectors Gene Autry and Frog Millhouse are accused of favoritism when they try to help an old rancher and his attractive daughter whose cattle appear have hoof and mouth disease and are doomed to be destroyed.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Crime)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Chicago, (2002, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of 6 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and based on the hit Broadway musical, Chicago is a dazzling spectacle cheered by audiences and critics alike, where crimes of passion make way for legends to those seeking the spotlight.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.title: A Walk In The Woods, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).

programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.

programme.desc: Usagi decides to take the Princess Seminar course and the other Sailor Guardians join her. This is actually a trap set up by the Dark Kingdom.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that its Kunzites plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.

programme.desc: The Dark Kingdom is trying to revive the Seven Great Monsters. Sailor Mercury and Jupiter scramble to protect Ryo Urawa.
programme.sub-title: I Won't Run Away from Love Anymore: Ami vs. Mamoru

programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minakos former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.

programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Guardians appear to have a falling-out. But its all part of the plan to locate the enemys hideout.

programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians head into the Arctic Circle. Queen Beryl sends the DD Girls. The Sailor Guardians fall as they try to defeat the DD Girls.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.

programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls Academy, which Rei attends. Usagi and Ami go to check up on her.
programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.

programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.

programme.desc: A battle-hardened mercenary leads a team of soldiers on a daring mission to rescue hostages in remote Africa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: When alien invaders lay waste to planet Earth, its up to a select group of survivors to make a last-ditch stand. Fighting superior technology, mankinds best weapon is the will to survive. Starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley reawakens from cryogenic sleep a half-century after a narrow escape from her alien foe, only to be sent to a remote colony to help battle an infestation of Xenomorphs. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Carrie Henn, Michael Biehn.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: With Meech MIA, Terry manages the business independently to keep the cash flowing and finds himself at odds as he seeks to exert more control over BMF.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry are focused on expanding their business; while Terry looks for a new connection in South Carolina, a new musical artist piques Meechs interest; Detective Bryant continues his pursuit of BMF.

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz trumpeter Chet Baker (Ethan Hawke) begins a romance with an actress (Carmen Ejogo) while trying to stage a musical comeback. Starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo, Callum Keith Rennie.

programme.title: Maliglutit
programme.desc: In 1913 in the Canadian Arctic, Kuanana returns from hunting to find his wife and daughter kidnapped and sets of to find the men who did it. Starring Benjamin Kunuk, Karen Ivalu, Jonah Qunaq.

programme.title: Fubar 2

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to a woman hiding a large sum of money with one of her close friends; when the woman goes missing, her friend, Ashley, is believed to be involved in more than just attempted fraud.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: After police discovers Melinda Pleskovic dead in her home just days before her daughters wedding, police turn to her future son-in-law when his story doesnt seem to add up; he has news of his own, break-ins at the Pleskovic home reveal the culprit.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Its in the Family
programme.desc: Exploring family relationships, both the loving and the difficult.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - The Weight of Grief
programme.desc: Loss is never easy, but exploring the impact of grief is necessary.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Fading Youth
programme.desc: Exploring how regardless of the situation, the events of ones youth are defining.

programme.title: In the Meantime
programme.desc: Soon to be married, a bride (Kali Hawk) finds that her friendship with a fellow volunteer (Darrin Dewitt Henson) at an adult-literacy program is developing into something much more intense.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Never Scrub Your Floors Again
programme.desc: See why this cleaning tool replaces chemicals and hard labor!

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology
programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Never Scrub Your Floors Again
programme.desc: See why this cleaning tool replaces chemicals and hard labor!

programme.title: Cindy Crawford talks about the latest breakthroughs in skincare
programme.desc: Join Cindy Crawford as she talks to real customers about the breakthrough skincare system that keeps them looking their best. Take a trip to the stunning French countryside to see the rare French melon that defies the aging process.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - You Choose Your Friends
programme.desc: Friends are the family people choose, for better or worse.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - The Ultimate Herbed Steam in Bag Snapper
programme.desc: Learning to make fish and seafood with Master Chef Shular as he shares the fundamentals of cooking fish, infusing herbs and spices and perfecting the Steam in Bag technique.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Everything Crusted Salmon And Salad One of Americas Favorite
programme.desc: Bland salmon is a thing of the past as chef Shular twists it into the flavored seasoned classic.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Love that Cajun Fried Chicken from Shulars!
programme.desc: Master chef Shular fries up Cajun-seasoned buttermilk chicken.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Cant Believe its Vegan! Carrot Dogs, Hummus Pizza and Fried Buffalo Cauliflower
programme.desc: Chef Shular shares techniques and tricks.

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Determined to help at-risk youths avoid the mistakes he made, an ex-con (Cuba Gooding Jr.) forms a chess club to offer them an alternative to running with street gangs.

programme.title: Shes Not Our Sister
programme.desc: After three sisters bury their father, family secrets are revealed that will alter their lives forever. But things really take a turn when a will is discovered that reveals that things are not as black and white as they thought them to be.

programme.title: Family Time - Its a Grey Area
programme.desc: Tony is upset when he discovers a grey hair and Lisa is amused.

programme.title: Family Time - The First Rule of Fight Night Is You Do Not Talk About Fight Night
programme.desc: Tony hosts fight night with his friends on the same night as Lisas dinner party.

programme.title: Family Time - The Will
programme.desc: Tony and Lisas family argue over who should take custody of their children if something happens to them.

programme.title: Family Time - No New Friends
programme.desc: When an old friend of Tonys moves into the neighborhood, the Stallworths realize things arent exactly as they seem.

programme.title: Family Time - Hospitality
programme.desc: Lisa invites Tonys godparents to stay for a few nights but no one can get them to leave.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Music Mac
programme.desc: When Vanessa surprises everyone with her musical talent, Isaac Hayes offers Bernie advice on how to nurture it.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Walk Like a Man
programme.desc: Bernie sees children walking to school on their own and decides it is time for Jordan to do the same, despite Wandas objections.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Father Knows Best
programme.desc: When a man arrives from Chicago claiming to be Bryanas father, Bernie is cautiously supportive.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Wrestling With a Sticky Situation
programme.desc: When Jordan joins the wrestling team, he overeats and finds himself in a weight class in which he is outmatched.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Marathon Mac
programme.desc: When Bernie agrees to participate in a celebrity marathon, Vanessa declares that she will finish the race ahead of him.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Whole Left Side
programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) welcomes the opportunity to impress Cedrics (Cedric The Entertainer) beloved Grandma Puddin.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - My Two Big Daddies
programme.desc: Posing as a single father, Steve (Steve Harvey) uses young Romeo (Merlin Santana) to rope in an attractive single mother (guest star Alex Datcher).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Boomerang
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) becomes a fool for love when he falls for Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) friend (guest star Roxanne Beckford). With William Lee Scott.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - All About Steve
programme.desc: A power-hungry Steve fills in for Regina as acting principal for a few days; Cedric and Lovita disagree about their wedding day.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - And Injustice for All
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) faces a judge (guest star Arnetia Walker) when Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) takes him to court after he sells her a broken TV set.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Educating Piggy
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) have to take a computer course taught by Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn).

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Welcome to Bernies
programme.desc: Steve, Cedric, Lovita and Regina (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer, Terri J. Vaughn, Wendy Raquel Robinson) attend a seminar on faculty relationships.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - What You Wont Cue for Love
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) take on Regina and Lovita (Wendy Raquel Robinson, Terri J. Vaughn) in a pool tournament.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Rent
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) falls for an IRS agent (guest star Vanessa Williams) who suspects that Cedric (Cedric The Entertainer) is committing tax fraud.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Everybody Loves Regina
programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) goes out of her way to prove to Steve (Steve Harvey) that she still has some song and dance in her system. Singer Busta Rhymes guest stars.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Every Boy Needs a Teacher
programme.desc: A strange double date results after Steve and Regina (Steve Harvey, Wendy Raquel Robinson) both find new romances with unlikely people.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Lovita Doesnt Live Here Anymore
programme.desc: Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) walks out on her mother but doesnt find a big welcome from Cedric, Steve and Regina (Cedric The Entertainer, Steve Harvey, Wendy Raquel Robinson).

programme.title: Shes Not Our Sister

programme.title: RoboCop (2014)

programme.title: The Tomorrow War (2021)

programme.title: The Matrix (1999)

programme.title: Raging Bull (1980)

programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when its implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organizations name.
